org.opendaylight.controller.connectionmanager.internal

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.connectionmanager.internal.ConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandProvider, ICacheUpdateAware<Node,java.util.Set<java.net.InetAddress>>, ICoordinatorChangeAware, IConnectionManager, IConnectionListener, IPluginOutConnectionService, IListenInventoryUpdates

    public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConnectionManager, IConnectionListener, ICoordinatorChangeAware, IListenInventoryUpdates, ICacheUpdateAware<Node,java.util.Set<java.net.InetAddress>>, CommandProvider

      • isLocal

        public boolean isLocal(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: IPluginOutConnectionService
        Method to test if a node is local to a controller.
        Specified by:
        isLocal in interface IConnectionManager
        Specified by:
        isLocal in interface IPluginOutConnectionService
        Parameters:
        node - The node for which the locality is being tested
        Returns:
        true if node is local to this controller.
        false if either node is not connected to this controller or not connected to any other controllers in the cluster.

      • getLocalityStatus

        public ConnectionLocality getLocalityStatus(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: IConnectionManager
        getLocalityStatus provides the tri-state connectivity status as opposed to the binary status returned by isLocal. ConnectionLocality enum that is returned by this method also includes the case of a Node not connected to any of the controllers in the cluster.
        Specified by:
        getLocalityStatus in interface IConnectionManager
        Specified by:
        getLocalityStatus in interface IPluginOutConnectionService
        Parameters:
        node - The node for which the locality is being verified
        Returns:
        ConnectionLocality

      • connect

        public Node connect(java.lang.String connectionIdentifier,
           java.util.Map<ConnectionConstants,java.lang.String> params)
        Description copied from interface: IConnectionManager
        Connect to a node
        Specified by:
        connect in interface IConnectionManager
        Parameters:
        connectionIdentifier - identifier with which the application would refer to a given connection.
        params - Connection Params in Map format. This is entirely handled by the south-bound plugins and is an opaque value for SAL or Connection Manager. Typical values keyed inside this params are Management IP-Address, Username, Password, Security Keys, etc...
        Returns:
        Node Node connected to.

      • connect

        public Node connect(java.lang.String type,
           java.lang.String connectionIdentifier,
           java.util.Map<ConnectionConstants,java.lang.String> params)
        Description copied from interface: IConnectionManager
        Connect to a node
        Specified by:
        connect in interface IConnectionManager
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the node representing NodeIDType.
        connectionIdentifier - identifier with which the application would refer to a given connection.
        params - Connection Params in Map format. This is entirely handled by the south-bound plugins and is an opaque value for SAL or Connection Manager. Typical values keyed inside this params are Management IP-Address, Username, Password, Security Keys, etc...
        Returns:
        Status of the Connect Operation.

      • entryCreated

        public void entryCreated(Node key,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheUpdateAware
        Invoked when a new entry is available in the cache, the key is only provided, the value will come as an entryUpdate invocation
        Specified by:
        entryCreated in interface ICacheUpdateAware<Node,java.util.Set<java.net.InetAddress>>
        Parameters:
        key - Key for the entry just created
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node

                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)

        Specified by:
        entryUpdated in interface ICacheUpdateAware<Node,java.util.Set<java.net.InetAddress>>
        Parameters:
        node - Key for the entry modified
        newControllers - the new value the key will have
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node
